div.marquee: --Keep up-to-date with information on closure below in the "Academic Opportunities for Students During Closure" link -- NNTC encourages people to drive to the hotspots and to sit in vehicles while online for social distancing recommendations. Allen location – 212 S. Clark St.--

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 22:52 pm CDT

div.div: A chance of showers, mainly before 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 40. Light and variable wind becoming southwest 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. Breezy, with a southwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming west northwest 15 to 25 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 34. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.

a.em: Search

div.p:
UPDATES
4/15/2020
--New updates were added to the website today in the teacher tabs. Please continue to support your child in the learning opportunities that have been provided by the teachers. If you have any questions please reach out to the child/rens teachers from 8:00-4:00 during normal school days.
--Graduation dates have been . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Updated Information on Closure

h3.a: HEALTHY MENTAL HEALTH PRACTICES DURING COVID-19 PANDEMIC

div.p:
Dear Allen Families,
The current global situation with the on going COVID-19 (Coronavirus) seems to be reaching us all in one way or another. It may seem like it is far away or close to home. Regardless, our students and families are seeing information on the news, phones, word of mouth, etc. Everyone processes information differently and your or your child(ren) may have great concerns about COVID-19. There is a lot of . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about HEALTHY MENTAL HEALTH PRACTICES DURING COVID-19 PANDEMIC

div.p: The office for Allen Consolidated Schools will be closed for spring break starting at 2:00 on Thursday April 9th and reopen on Tuesday April 14th at 8:00 am. Please keep that in mind as you are trying to pick up packets for our younger students. Please continue to refer to the website for up to date information on the school closure and how to access learning opportunities.

a.aria-label: Read more about Office Hours - Spring Break
